response.job_title: Buyer | Procurement | Planning | Supply Chain management
response.summary: Chemical engineer with knowledge in logistics, supply chain management, procurement and planning. Work experience in the pharmaceutical, massive consume and carriers industry. Skilled in data analysis with Excel, SAP ERP and Power BI.
response.skills: Purchasing, Procurement, Retail, Budget Management, Microsoft Excel, SAP ERP, Supply Chain Management, SAP Products, Production Planning

profile_positions.description:
Quala is a multi-national massive production enterprise that creates and distributes food, beverages, personal care products, ice-based desserts, and candies, among others.
- Ensuring a reliable supplying for direct materials.
- Negotiation process with suppliers analyzing the market conditions and fulfill supply requirements.
- Tracking and data analysis of E2E procurement process.
- Financial and budget analysis and reporting.
- Projects and strategies development improving the sourcing and negotiation process.
- KPI’s monitoring for stakeholders and suppliers.
- Brand and new categories sourcing development process.
profile_positions.title: Buyer

profile_positions.description:
Novartis is a global healthcare company based in Switzerland that provides solutions to address the evolving needs of patients worldwide.
- Forecast and supply planning in SAP
- Data analysis with Excel and Power BI
- Procurement with vendors and 3PL, E2E order management
- Logistics coordination  management  (Warehousing, 3PL , distribution and foreign commerce)
- Cross-divisional teams coordination (Regulatory affairs, quality assurance, customer service and sales)
- Exports management
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Analyst | Andean Cluster

profile_positions.description:
UPS is the world's premier package delivery company and a leading provider of global supply chain management solutions.
- Customer bilingual support
- Logistics transportation support
- Domestic deliveries priorities coordination (Continental USA)
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative

company.name: Quala
company.description: Somos una compañía de alcance multilatino con marcas que sorprenden a más de 300 millones de consumidores en Latinoamérica, a través de 10 compañías que llevan los productos Quala a cada mercado con más de 10 mil colaboradores.
